name: Home-For-Spirits System
desc: The core system of Celestial Mount Circle, allocating ships' computing power to enable the full power mode of built-in funnels which they couldn't have access to by common methods. The funnels, which is named as spirits, will make ship lose its performance while they are destoryed or reserved. Each loss of funnel contributes to reducing flux dissipation,top speed and maneuverability by %s(depending on hull size).

name: High-Priority Shield Generator
desc: Shield generator is the second key safety system of Celestial Mount Circle. While the shield is unfolding, the fire rate of all weapons will be reduced to a minimum of %s according to the unfolded area, and the upkeep flux of shield will be reduced to a minimum of %s.
